java
class Solution {
    // æ ‡å‡†çš„äºŒåˆ†æœç´¢æ¡†æ¶ï¼Œæœç´¢ç›®æ ‡å…ƒç´ çš„ç´¢å¼•ï¼Œè‹¥ä¸å­˜åœ¨åˆ™è¿”å› -1
    public int search(int[] nums, int target) {
        int left = 0;
        // æ³¨æ„
        int right = nums.length - 1;

        while(left <= right) {
            int mid = left + (right - left) / 2;
            if(nums[mid] == target) {
                return mid;   
            } else if (nums[mid] < target) {
                // æ³¨æ„
                left = mid + 1;
            } else if (nums[mid] > target) {
                // æ³¨æ„
                right = mid - 1;
            }
        }
        return -1;
    }
}

int left_bound(int[] nums, int target) {
    int left = 0;
    // æ³¨æ„
    int right = nums.length;
    
    // æ³¨æ„
    while (left < right) {
        int mid = left + (right - left) / 2;
        if (nums[mid] == target) {
            right = mid;
        } else if (nums[mid] < target) {
            left = mid + 1;
        } else if (nums[mid] > target) {
            // æ³¨æ„
            right = mid;
        }
    }
    return left;
}

int left_bound(int[] nums, int target) {
    int left = 0, right = nums.length - 1;
    // æœç´¢åŒºé—´ä¸º [left, right]
    while (left <= right) {
        int mid = left + (right - left) / 2;
        if (nums[mid] < target) {
            // æœç´¢åŒºé—´å˜ä¸º [mid+1, right]
            left = mid + 1;
        } else if (nums[mid] > target) {
            // æœç´¢åŒºé—´å˜ä¸º [left, mid-1]
            right = mid - 1;
        } else if (nums[mid] == target) {
            // æ”¶ç¼©å³ä¾§è¾¹ç•Œ
            right = mid - 1;
        }
    }
    // åˆ¤æ–­ target æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨äº nums ä¸­
    // å¦‚æœè¶Šç•Œï¼Œtarget è‚¯å®šä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œè¿”å› -1
    if (left < 0 || left >= nums.length) {
        return -1;
    }
    // åˆ¤æ–­ä¸€ä¸‹ nums[left] æ˜¯ä¸æ˜¯ target
    return nums[left] == target ? left : -1;
}

    for left <= right {
        mid := left + (right - left) / 2
        if nums[mid] < target {
            // æœç´¢åŒºé—´å˜ä¸º [mid+1, right]
            left = mid + 1
        } else if nums[mid] > target {
            // æœç´¢åŒºé—´å˜ä¸º [left, mid-1]
            right = mid - 1
        } else if nums[mid] == target {
            // æ”¶ç¼©å³ä¾§è¾¹ç•Œ
            right = mid - 1
        }
    }
    // åˆ¤æ–­ target æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨äº nums ä¸­
    if left < 0 || left >= len(nums) {
        return -1
    }
    // å¦‚æœè¶Šç•Œï¼Œtarget è‚¯å®šä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œè¿”å› -1
    if nums[left] == target {

        return left
    }
    return -1
}

        int mid = left + (right - left) / 2;
        if (nums[mid] < target) {

}

java
class Solution {
    // æ ‡å‡†çš„äºŒåˆ†æœç´¢æ¡†æ¶ï¼Œæœç´¢ç›®æ ‡å…ƒç´ çš„ç´¢å¼•ï¼Œè‹¥ä¸å­˜åœ¨åˆ™è¿”å› -1
    public int search(int[] nums, int target) {
        int left = 0;
        // æ³¨æ„
        int right = nums.length - 1;

        while(left <= right) {
            int mid = left + (right - left) / 2;
            if(nums[mid] == target) {
                return mid;   
            } else if (nums[mid] < target) {
                // æ³¨æ„
                left = mid + 1;
            } else if (nums[mid] > target) {
                // æ³¨æ„
                right = mid - 1;
            }
        }
        return -1;
    }
}

int left_bound(int[] nums, int target) {
    int left = 0;
    // æ³¨æ„
    int right = nums.length;
    
    // æ³¨æ„
    while (left < right) {
        int mid = left + (right - left) / 2;
        if (nums[mid] == target) {
            right = mid;
        } else if (nums[mid] < target) {
            left = mid + 1;
        } else if (nums[mid] > target) {
            // æ³¨æ„
            right = mid;
        }
    }
    return left;
}

int right_bound(int[] nums, int target) {
    int left = 0, right = nums.length - 1;
    while (left <= right) {
        int mid = left + (right - left) / 2;
        if (nums[mid] < target) {
            left = mid + 1;
        } else if (nums[mid] > target) {
            right = mid - 1;
        } else if (nums[mid] == target) {
            // è¿™é‡Œæ”¹æˆæ”¶ç¼©å·¦ä¾§è¾¹ç•Œå³å¯
            left = mid + 1;
        }
    }
    // æœ€åæ”¹æˆè¿”å› left - 1
    if (left - 1 < 0 || left - 1 >= nums.length) {
        return -1;
    }
    return nums[left - 1] == target ? (left - 1) : -1;
}

int binary_search(int[] nums, int target) {
    int left = 0, right = nums.length - 1; 
    while(left <= right) {
        int mid = left + (right - left) / 2;
        if (nums[mid] < target) {
            left = mid + 1;
        } else if (nums[mid] > target) {
            right = mid - 1; 
        } else if(nums[mid] == target) {
            // ç›´æ¥è¿”å›
            return mid;
        }
    }
    // ç›´æ¥è¿”å›
    return -1;
}

def binary_search(nums: List[int], target: int) -> int:
    # è®¾ç½®å·¦å³ä¸‹æ ‡
    left, right = 0, len(nums) - 1
    while left <= right:
        mid = left + (right - left) // 2
        if nums[mid] < target:
            left = mid + 1
        elif nums[mid] > target:
            right = mid - 1
        elif nums[mid] == target:
            # æ‰¾åˆ°ç›®æ ‡å€¼
            return mid
    # æ²¡æœ‰æ‰¾åˆ°ç›®æ ‡å€¼
    return -1

def left_bound(nums: List[int], target: int) -> int:
    # è®¾ç½®å·¦å³ä¸‹æ ‡

    while left <= right:
        mid = left + (right - left) // 2
        if nums[mid] < target:

        elif nums[mid] > target:
            right = mid - 1
        elif nums[mid] == target:
            # å­˜åœ¨ç›®æ ‡å€¼ï¼Œç¼©å°å³è¾¹ç•Œ
            right = mid - 1
    # åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨ç›®æ ‡å€¼

    return left if nums[left] == target else -1

func binarySearch(nums []int, target int) int {
    left, right := 0, len(nums)-1
    for left <= right {
        mid := left + (right - left) / 2
        if nums[mid] < target {
            left = mid + 1
        } else if nums[mid] > target {
            right = mid - 1
        } else if nums[mid] == target {
            // ç›´æ¥è¿”å›

    // ç›´æ¥è¿”å›
    return -1
}

    }
    // åˆ¤æ–­ target æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨äº nums ä¸­
    if left < 0 || left >= len(nums) {
        return -1
    }
    // åˆ¤æ–­ä¸€ä¸‹ nums[left] æ˜¯ä¸æ˜¯ target
    if nums[left] == target {

    }

}

func rightBound(nums []int, target int) int {
    left, right := 0, len(nums)-1
    for left <= right {
        mid := left + (right - left) / 2
        if nums[mid] < target {
            left = mid + 1
        } else if nums[mid] > target {
            right = mid - 1
        } else if nums[mid] == target {
            // åˆ«è¿”å›ï¼Œé”å®šå³ä¾§è¾¹ç•Œ
            left = mid + 1
        }
    }
    
    if right < 0 || right >= len(nums) {
        return -1
    }
    if nums[right] == target {
        return right
    }
    return -1
}

    var left = 0, right = nums.length - 1;

        var mid = left + Math.floor((right - left) / 2);
        if (nums[mid] < target) {
            left = mid + 1;
        } else if (nums[mid] > target) {
            right = mid - 1; 
        } else if(nums[mid] == target) {

            return mid;
        }
    }

    return -1;
}

var left_bound = function(nums, target) {
    var left = 0, right = nums.length - 1;
    while (left <= right) {
        var mid = left + Math.floor((right - left) / 2);
        if (nums[mid] < target) {
            left = mid + 1;
        } else if (nums[mid] > target) {
            right = mid - 1;
        } else if (nums[mid] == target) {
            // åˆ«è¿”å›ï¼Œé”å®šå·¦ä¾§è¾¹ç•Œ
            right = mid - 1;
        }
    }
    // åˆ¤æ–­ target æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨äº nums ä¸­
    if (left < 0 || left >= nums.length) {
        return -1;
    }
    // åˆ¤æ–­ä¸€ä¸‹ nums[left] æ˜¯ä¸æ˜¯ target
    return nums[left] == target ? left : -1;
}

var right_bound = function(nums, target) {
    var left = 0, right = nums.length - 1;
    while (left <= right) {
        var mid = left + Math.floor((right - left) / 2);
        if (nums[mid] < target) {
            left = mid + 1;
        } else if (nums[mid] > target) {
            right = mid - 1;
        } else if (nums[mid] == target) {
            // åˆ«è¿”å›ï¼Œé”å®šå³ä¾§è¾¹ç•Œ
            left = mid + 1;
        }

    // ç”±äº while çš„ç»“æŸæ¡ä»¶æ˜¯ right == left - 1ï¼Œä¸”ç°åœ¨åœ¨æ±‚å³è¾¹ç•Œ
    // æ‰€ä»¥ç”¨ right æ›¿ä»£ left - 1 æ›´å¥½è®°
    if (right < 0 || right >= nums.length) {
        return -1;
    }
    return nums[right] == target ? right : -1;
}

    java
    class Solution {
    // æ ‡å‡†çš„äºŒåˆ†æœç´¢æ¡†æ¶ï¼Œæœç´¢ç›®æ ‡å…ƒç´ çš„ç´¢å¼•ï¼Œè‹¥ä¸å­˜åœ¨åˆ™è¿”å› -1
    public int search(int[] nums, int target) {
        int left = 0;
        // æ³¨æ„
        int right = nums.length - 1;

        while(left <= right) {
            int mid = left + (right - left) / 2;
            if(nums[mid] == target) {
                return mid;   
            } else if (nums[mid] < target) {
                // æ³¨æ„
                left = mid + 1;
            } else if (nums[mid] > target) {
                // æ³¨æ„
                right = mid - 1;
            }
        }
        return -1;
    }
}

    int left_bound(int[] nums, int target) {
    int left = 0;
    // æ³¨æ„
    int right = nums.length;
    
    // æ³¨æ„
    while (left < right) {
        int mid = left + (right - left) / 2;
        if (nums[mid] == target) {
            right = mid;
        } else if (nums[mid] < target) {
            left = mid + 1;
        } else if (nums[mid] > target) {
            // æ³¨æ„
            right = mid;
        }
    }
    return left;
}

    int left_bound(int[] nums, int target) {
    int left = 0, right = nums.length - 1;
    // æœç´¢åŒºé—´ä¸º [left, right]
    while (left <= right) {
        int mid = left + (right - left) / 2;
        if (nums[mid] < target) {
            // æœç´¢åŒºé—´å˜ä¸º [mid+1, right]
            left = mid + 1;
        } else if (nums[mid] > target) {
            // æœç´¢åŒºé—´å˜ä¸º [left, mid-1]
            right = mid - 1;
        } else if (nums[mid] == target) {
            // æ”¶ç¼©å³ä¾§è¾¹ç•Œ
            right = mid - 1;
        }
    }
    // åˆ¤æ–­ target æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨äº nums ä¸­
    // å¦‚æœè¶Šç•Œï¼Œtarget è‚¯å®šä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œè¿”å› -1
    if (left < 0 || left >= nums.length) {
        return -1;
    }
    // åˆ¤æ–­ä¸€ä¸‹ nums[left] æ˜¯ä¸æ˜¯ target
    return nums[left] == target ? left : -1;
}

    // å°†ç»™å®šçš„æ•°å­— nums æœç´¢ target çš„å·¦ä¾§è¾¹ç•Œ
func left_bound(nums []int, target int) int {
    left := 0
    right := len(nums) - 1
    // æœç´¢åŒºé—´ä¸º [left, right]
    for left <= right {
        mid := left + (right - left) / 2
        if nums[mid] < target {
            // æœç´¢åŒºé—´å˜ä¸º [mid+1, right]
            left = mid + 1
        } else if nums[mid] > target {
            // æœç´¢åŒºé—´å˜ä¸º [left, mid-1]
            right = mid - 1
        } else if nums[mid] == target {
            // æ”¶ç¼©å³ä¾§è¾¹ç•Œ
            right = mid - 1
        }
    }
    // åˆ¤æ–­ target æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨äº nums ä¸­
    if left < 0 || left >= len(nums) {
        return -1
    }
    // å¦‚æœè¶Šç•Œï¼Œtarget è‚¯å®šä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œè¿”å› -1
    if nums[left] == target {
        // åˆ¤æ–­ä¸€ä¸‹ nums[left] æ˜¯ä¸æ˜¯ target
        return left
    }
    return -1
}

    def left_bound(nums: List[int], target: int) -> int:
    left, right = 0, len(nums) - 1
    # æœç´¢åŒºé—´ä¸º [left, right]
    
    while left <= right:
        mid = left + (right - left) // 2
        if nums[mid] < target:
            # æœç´¢åŒºé—´å˜ä¸º [mid+1, right]
            left = mid + 1
        elif nums[mid] > target:
            # æœç´¢åŒºé—´å˜ä¸º [left, mid-1]
            right = mid - 1
        elif nums[mid] == target:
            # æ”¶ç¼©å³ä¾§è¾¹ç•Œ
            right = mid - 1
    
    # åˆ¤æ–­ target æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨äº nums ä¸­
    # å¦‚æœè¶Šç•Œï¼Œtarget è‚¯å®šä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œè¿”å› -1
    if left < 0 or left >= len(nums):
        return -1
    
    # åˆ¤æ–­ä¸€ä¸‹ nums[left] æ˜¯ä¸æ˜¯ target
    return left if nums[left] == target else -1

    // å°†ç»™å®šçš„æ•°å­— nums æœç´¢ target çš„å·¦ä¾§è¾¹ç•Œ
func left_bound(nums []int, target int) int {
    left := 0
    right := len(nums) - 1
    // æœç´¢åŒºé—´ä¸º [left, right]
    for left <= right {
        mid := left + (right - left) / 2
        if nums[mid] < target {
            // æœç´¢åŒºé—´å˜ä¸º [mid+1, right]
            left = mid + 1
        } else if nums[mid] > target {
            // æœç´¢åŒºé—´å˜ä¸º [left, mid-1]
            right = mid - 1
        } else if nums[mid] == target {
            // æ”¶ç¼©å³ä¾§è¾¹ç•Œ
            right = mid - 1
        }
    }
    // åˆ¤æ–­ target æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨äº nums ä¸­
    if left < 0 || left >= len(nums) {
        return -1
    }
    // å¦‚æœè¶Šç•Œï¼Œtarget è‚¯å®šä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œè¿”å› -1
    if nums[left] == target {
        // åˆ¤æ–­ä¸€ä¸‹ nums[left] æ˜¯ä¸æ˜¯ target
        return left
    }
    return -1
}

    var left_bound = function(nums, target) {
    var left = 0, right = nums.length - 1;
    // æœç´¢åŒºé—´ä¸º [left, right]
    while (left <= right) {
        var mid = left + Math.floor((right - left) / 2);
        if (nums[mid] < target) {
            // æœç´¢åŒºé—´å˜ä¸º [mid+1, right]
            left = mid + 1;
        } else if (nums[mid] > target) {
            // æœç´¢åŒºé—´å˜ä¸º [left, mid-1]
            right = mid - 1;
        } else if (nums[mid] == target) {
            // æ”¶ç¼©å³ä¾§è¾¹ç•Œ
            right = mid - 1;
        }
    }
    // åˆ¤æ–­ target æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨äº nums ä¸­
    // å¦‚æœè¶Šç•Œï¼Œtarget è‚¯å®šä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œè¿”å› -1
    if (left < 0 || left >= nums.length) {
        return -1;
    }
    // åˆ¤æ–­ä¸€ä¸‹ nums[left] æ˜¯ä¸æ˜¯ target
    return nums[left] == target ? left : -1;
};

    int right_bound(int[] nums, int target) {
    int left = 0, right = nums.length;
    
    while (left < right) {
        int mid = left + (right - left) / 2;
        if (nums[mid] == target) {
            // æ³¨æ„
            left = mid + 1;
        } else if (nums[mid] < target) {
            left = mid + 1;
        } else if (nums[mid] > target) {
            right = mid;
        }
    }
    // æ³¨æ„
    return left - 1;
}

    ç­”ï¼šå½“ç„¶å¯ä»¥ï¼Œç±»ä¼¼æœç´¢å·¦ä¾§è¾¹ç•Œçš„ç»Ÿä¸€å†™æ³•ï¼Œå…¶å®åªè¦æ”¹ä¸¤ä¸ªåœ°æ–¹å°±è¡Œäº†ï¼š

    java ğŸŸ¢
    int right_bound(int[] nums, int target) {
    int left = 0, right = nums.length - 1;
    while (left <= right) {
        int mid = left + (right - left) / 2;
        if (nums[mid] < target) {
            left = mid + 1;
        } else if (nums[mid] > target) {
            right = mid - 1;
        } else if (nums[mid] == target) {
            // è¿™é‡Œæ”¹æˆæ”¶ç¼©å·¦ä¾§è¾¹ç•Œå³å¯
            left = mid + 1;
        }
    }
    // æœ€åæ”¹æˆè¿”å› left - 1
    if (left - 1 < 0 || left - 1 >= nums.length) {
        return -1;
    }
    return nums[left - 1] == target ? (left - 1) : -1;
}

    int right_bound(int[] nums, int target) {
    int left = 0, right = nums.length - 1;
    while (left <= right) {
        int mid = left + (right - left) / 2;
        if (nums[mid] < target) {
            left = mid + 1;
        } else if (nums[mid] > target) {
            right = mid - 1;
        } else if (nums[mid] == target) {
            // è¿™é‡Œæ”¹æˆæ”¶ç¼©å·¦ä¾§è¾¹ç•Œå³å¯
            left = mid + 1;
        }
    }
    // æœ€åæ”¹æˆè¿”å› right
    if (right < 0 || right >= nums.length) {
        return -1;
    }
    return nums[right] == target ? right : -1;
}

    int binary_search(int[] nums, int target) {
    int left = 0, right = nums.length - 1; 
    while(left <= right) {
        int mid = left + (right - left) / 2;
        if (nums[mid] < target) {
            left = mid + 1;
        } else if (nums[mid] > target) {
            right = mid - 1; 
        } else if(nums[mid] == target) {
            // ç›´æ¥è¿”å›
            return mid;
        }
    }
    // ç›´æ¥è¿”å›
    return -1;
}

int left_bound(int[] nums, int target) {
    int left = 0, right = nums.length - 1;
    while (left <= right) {
        int mid = left + (right - left) / 2;
        if (nums[mid] < target) {
            left = mid + 1;
        } else if (nums[mid] > target) {
            right = mid - 1;
        } else if (nums[mid] == target) {
            // åˆ«è¿”å›ï¼Œé”å®šå·¦ä¾§è¾¹ç•Œ
            right = mid - 1;
        }
    }
    // åˆ¤æ–­ target æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨äº nums ä¸­
    if (left < 0 || left >= nums.length) {
        return -1;
    }
    // åˆ¤æ–­ä¸€ä¸‹ nums[left] æ˜¯ä¸æ˜¯ target
    return nums[left] == target ? left : -1;
}

int right_bound(int[] nums, int target) {
    int left = 0, right = nums.length - 1;
    while (left <= right) {
        int mid = left + (right - left) / 2;
        if (nums[mid] < target) {
            left = mid + 1;
        } else if (nums[mid] > target) {
            right = mid - 1;
        } else if (nums[mid] == target) {
            // åˆ«è¿”å›ï¼Œé”å®šå³ä¾§è¾¹ç•Œ
            left = mid + 1;
        }
    }
    // ç”±äº while çš„ç»“æŸæ¡ä»¶æ˜¯ right == left - 1ï¼Œä¸”ç°åœ¨åœ¨æ±‚å³è¾¹ç•Œ
    // æ‰€ä»¥ç”¨ right æ›¿ä»£ left - 1 æ›´å¥½è®°
    if (right < 0 || right >= nums.length) {
        return -1;
    }
    return nums[right] == target ? right : -1;
}

    int binary_search(vector<int>& nums, int target) {
    int left = 0, right = nums.size()-1; 
    while(left <= right) {
        int mid = left + (right - left) / 2;
        if (nums[mid] < target) {
            left = mid + 1;
        } else if (nums[mid] > target) {
            right = mid - 1; 
        } else if(nums[mid] == target) {
            // ç›´æ¥è¿”å›
            return mid;
        }
    }
    // ç›´æ¥è¿”å›
    return -1;
}

int left_bound(vector<int>& nums, int target) {
    int left = 0, right = nums.size()-1;
    while (left <= right) {
        int mid = left + (right - left) / 2;
        if (nums[mid] < target) {
            left = mid + 1;
        } else if (nums[mid] > target) {
            right = mid - 1;
        } else if (nums[mid] == target) {
            // åˆ«è¿”å›ï¼Œé”å®šå·¦ä¾§è¾¹ç•Œ
            right = mid - 1;
        }
    }
    // åˆ¤æ–­ target æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨äº nums ä¸­
    if (left < 0 || left >= nums.size()) {
        return -1;
    }
    // åˆ¤æ–­ä¸€ä¸‹ nums[left] æ˜¯ä¸æ˜¯ target
    return nums[left] == target ? left : -1;

int right_bound(vector<int>& nums, int target) {
    int left = 0, right = nums.size()-1;
    while (left <= right) {
        int mid = left + (right - left) / 2;
        if (nums[mid] < target) {
            left = mid + 1;
        } else if (nums[mid] > target) {
            right = mid - 1;
        } else if (nums[mid] == target) {
            // åˆ«è¿”å›ï¼Œé”å®šå³ä¾§è¾¹ç•Œ
            left = mid + 1;
        }
    }
    // ç”±äº while çš„ç»“æŸæ¡ä»¶æ˜¯ right == left - 1ï¼Œä¸”ç°åœ¨åœ¨æ±‚å³è¾¹ç•Œ
    // æ‰€ä»¥ç”¨ right æ›¿ä»£ left - 1 æ›´å¥½è®°
    if (right < 0 || right >= nums.size()) {
        return -1;
    }
    return nums[right] == target ? right : -1;
}

    def binary_search(nums: List[int], target: int) -> int:
    # è®¾ç½®å·¦å³ä¸‹æ ‡
    left, right = 0, len(nums) - 1
    while left <= right:
        mid = left + (right - left) // 2
        if nums[mid] < target:
            left = mid + 1
        elif nums[mid] > target:
            right = mid - 1
        elif nums[mid] == target:
            # æ‰¾åˆ°ç›®æ ‡å€¼
            return mid
    # æ²¡æœ‰æ‰¾åˆ°ç›®æ ‡å€¼
    return -1
